oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Works Progress Administration adult education workshop
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Works Progress Administration Adult Education workshop/class. "WPA workers at STC improved landscaping and performed other manual labor. The program also hired out-of-work teachers, nurses, and dieticians to teach domestic skills." (Barnett, Holly, et al. Middle Tennessee State University. (College history series. Charleston, SC: Arcadia, 2001), 46)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: United States. Work Projects Administration; Occupational retraining; Middle Tennessee State Teachers College
Workshops (Adult Education)
